lead_paragraph: It seems altogether probable that the revolution in Northern Mexico will prove successful, and that a large department will establish its independence of the central government. The intelligence from that quarter which we published yesterday, indicates such a result. A significant fact was also stated in the extracts then given, that above two hundred Americans made up part of the revolutionary force.
